title: Two King Bed Guest Rooms
room_description: Gratify yourself with the privacy and ample space of our Two King Bed guest rooms, which feature two distinct bedrooms, each furnished with a luxurious king-size bed. You can also relish a complimentary cup of coffee while watching your favorite shows on one of our premium LED TVs. This suite ensures that everyone enjoys the room they require in a truly lavish manner.
special_offers: 10% off on bookings for stays longer than 3 nights

title: Standard Room
room_description: This room offers a simple and inviting atmosphere, featuring a Queen-sized bed and suitable for two guests. It’s well-suited for business travelers due to its chic work desk, and it’s also convenient for families, as it provides a mini fridge, microwave, and coffee maker, allowing you to save and reheat restaurant leftovers. This standard room presents an excellent choice for those seeking budget-friendly travel without compromising essential amenities.

title: Family Suite
room_description: Perfect for accommodating the whole family, this suite provides two double beds and a sofa bed, making it possible for up to six guests to experience the best of the New York / New Jersey area. Combining generous living areas with affordability, this roomy and convenient suite guarantees ample space for everyone to relax and unwind.

title: Two Double Bed Ada Suite
room_description: The Two Double Bed ADA Suite boasts a separate living space complete with a sofa bed, providing comfort for up to 4 occupants. This suite features an open living arrangement and includes amenities like a refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker. You’ll find HDTVs in each room, and the bathroom is equipped with a marble vanity and premium amenities for your enjoyment.

title: King Bed Suite
room_description: The King Bed Suite combines both practicality and distinct areas, featuring a roomy bedroom with a king-size bed and a separate living space furnished with a sofa bed. This suite is suitable for accommodating up to four individuals and comes with premium amenities to enhance the experience for the whole family.

title: King Bed Suite (Ada)
room_description: The King Bed Suite (ADA) provides a blend of practicality, separation, and accessibility, featuring a generously sized bedroom with a king-size bed and a separate living area complete with a sofa bed. This suite is designed to comfortably host up to four guests and is equipped with premium amenities to enhance the experience for the whole family.
special_offers: Welcome kit for your furry friend

title: Presidential Suite
room_description: Our Presidential Suite, the most expansive option available, combines opulence and coziness to create a roomy sanctuary that provides a home-like atmosphere for up to four occupants. Featuring two separate bedrooms each furnished with king-sized beds and two full bathrooms, this suite guarantees that everyone can enjoy their own personal space for rejuvenation and relaxation after exploring all that New Jersey has to offer.

title: King Executive Suite
room_description: Designed with luxury in mind, this remarkably roomy and contemporary suite offers a delightful experience! The King Executive Suite features a king-sized bed along with a distinct living space and a dining/conference area, ensuring the utmost in comfort. The sofa bed allows for a tranquil stay accommodating up to four individuals. A Complimentary American Breakfast Buffet is also included.

title: Standard Room
room_description: This room offers a simple and inviting atmosphere, featuring a Queen-sized bed and suitable for two guests. It’s well-suited for business travelers due to its chic work desk, and it’s also convenient for families, as it provides a mini fridge, microwave, and coffee maker, allowing you to save and reheat restaurant leftovers. This standard room presents an excellent choice for those seeking budget-friendly travel without compromising essential amenities.

title: Double Bed Executive Suite
room_description: An elegantly designed and distinctive suite featuring two double beds and a sofa bed, accommodating up to six individuals. The Double Bed Executive Suite provides a roomy and peaceful haven complete with luxurious amenities.
